mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume(resume_id, content, post_check, comment_id) VALUES(RESUME_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{content},#{postCheck},#{commentId})
mapper.update:
UPDATE resume SET post_check = #{postCheck}, comment_id = #{commentId},
WHERE resume_id = #{resumeId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.name, c.title, c.start_date, c.end_date, r.post_check FROM resume r INNER JOIN company c ON r.company_id = c.company_id WHERE r.resume_id = 1;
SELECT c.title, q.question, r.content FROM resume r, company c, question q WHERE r.company_id = c.company_id AND c.company_id = q.company_id AND c.company_id = #{companyId};

SELECT rc.content, rc.rate, ui.id, umi.company_name FROM resume_comment rc JOIN resume r ON rc.resume_id = r.resume_id JOIN user_mentor_info umi ON rc.mentor_id = umi.mentor_id JOIN user_info ui ON umi.user_id = ui.user_id WHERE r.resume_id = #{resumeId}
